report.name: x_stock_fi_client

userParameter.name: P_WHERE
userParameter.initialValue: from stock_fi s,ligne_bip lb, synthese_fin_ress sfr group by s.pid, s.cdeb, s.ident, s.cafi, s.typproj , s.metier , s.pnom,s.codsg,s.dpcode,s.icpi,s.codsgress,s.libdsg,s.codcamo,s.clibrca,s.rtype,s.soccode,s.coutftht,s.coutft,s.coutenv
userParameter.label: P Where

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select rpad(nvl(s.pid ,' '),4,' ') pid , rpad(nvl(to_char(s.cdeb,'MM/YYYY'),' '),7,' ') cdeb , rpad(nvl(s.typproj,' '),2,' ') typproj , rpad(nvl(s.metier,' '),3,' ') metier , rpad(nvl(s.pnom,' '),30,' ') pnom , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codsg),' '),7,'0') codsg , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.dpcode ),' '),5,'0') dpcode , rpad(nvl(s.icpi,' '),5,' ') icpi , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.cafi),' '),6,'0') cafi , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codsgress),' '),7,'0') codsgress , rpad(nvl(s.libdsg,' '),30,' ') libdsg , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codcamo),' '),6,'0') codcamo , rpad(nvl(s.clibrca,' '),16,' ') clibrca , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.ident),' '),5,'0') ident , rpad(nvl(s.rtype,' '),1,' ') rtype , rpad(nvl(s.soccode,' '),4,' ') soccode , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.coutftht, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') coutftht , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.coutft, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') coutft , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.coutenv, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') coutenv , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(sfr.d_consojh_im), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consojhimmo_dec, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(sfr.d_consojh_ni), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') nconsojhimmo_dec, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(sfr.d_consoft) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoft_dec, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(sfr.d_consoenv_im), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoenvimmo_dec, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(sfr.d_consoenv_ni), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') nconsoenvimmo_dec, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(sum(s.consojhimmo),0.00), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consojhimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(sum(s.nconsojhimmo),0.00), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') nconsojhimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.consoft), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoft, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.consoenvimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoenvimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.nconsoenvimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') nconsoenvimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.a_consojhimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_consojhimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.a_nconsojhimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_nconsojhimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.a_consoft), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_consoft, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.a_consoenvimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_consoenvimmo, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(sum(s.a_nconsoenvimmo), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_nconsoenvimmo &p_where

xmlSettings.xmlTag: Conso jh non immo dec N-1
Conso env non immo dec N-1

dataDescriptor.expression: lpad ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( NVL ( sum ( s.consojhimmo ) , 0.00 ) , 'FM9999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0,00' ) , 13 , ' ' )

xmlSettings.xmlTag: Conso jh non immo du mois

dataDescriptor.expression: lpad ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( NVL ( sum ( s.nconsojhimmo ) , 0.00 ) , 'FM9999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0,00' ) , 13 , ' ' )

xmlSettings.xmlTag: Conso env non immo du mois

function.name: afterpform
g_pidgroupfilter
